summary: best plugin for indent python code!
name: indentpython.vim--nianyang
install_details: put it into the indent directory,then enjoy it!

versions.release_notes:
fix the bug of http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=974 :
when there is a ':' in the end of the line,but the line is a type of "string" or "comment",the next line should not be indented.
